div.head: To the Reader.
div.l: HEre thou at greater Ease than hee
Mayst behold what hee did see;
But he alone reserves the paines.
He traded not with luker sotted.
He went for knowledge and he got it.
Then thank the Author: thanks is light,
Who hath presented to thy sight,
Seas, Lands, Men, Beasts, Fishes, and Birds,
The rarest that the World affoords.

closer.signed: THO. Lord FAYRFAX Baron of Cameron.
